revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Ruins of Alph |image = [[File:Ruins of Alph.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of the Ruins of Alph. |tokens = 3,000 |location = South of Violet City, on Route 32. }} '''Ruins of Alph''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 60,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Poliwag.png|40px]] Poliwag || rowspan=7|[[File:Psychic_(male).png|40px]] Psychic Nathan || rowspan=7|[[File:Girafarig.png|40px]] Girafarig |- | [[File:Poliwhirl.png|40px]] Poliwhirl |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Natu.png|40px]] Natu |- | [[File:Wooper.png|40px]] Wooper |- | [[File:Quagsire.png|40px]] Quagsire |- | [[File:Smeargle.png|40px]] Smeargle |- |}
===Boss Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[Ruins of Alph#Unown Encounters in Ruins of Alph|Unown (A) -> Unown (QuestionMark)]] || rowspan=7|<center>280,000 || rowspan=7 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Unown_(F).png|40px]] Unown (F) |- | [[File:Unown_(H).png|40px]] Unown (H) |- | [[File:Unown_(L).png|40px]] Unown (L) |- | [[File:Unown_(N).png|40px]] Unown (N) |- | [[File:Unown_(P).png|40px]] Unown (P) |- | [[File:Unown_(U).png|40px]] Unown (U) |- |} -> [[File:Unown_(QuestionMark).png|30px]]
==== Unown Encounters in Ruins of Alph ==== All 28 Unown Forms (seen below) can be found in Ruins of Alph as Dungeon Bosses. Once Unown form per day is randomly chosen to be the boss.
